name: Cyber Trial
description:
You must proof your worth. To do so you dispose of a grappling hook and a cyber arm that can shoot bullets and slow time. With this tools you must complete all levels within the 30 second time limit.

Are you up to the task?

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

All assets and code created by: Gerard Belenguer

Tools used: Unity, Blender, Audacity, Ableton, Bfxr

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Game created for the let's create GameJam

*Not sure if the Mac version works

**I recommend the fix slow version for a more stable experience
